of the 12 team play , only essendon and footscray score below 10 point

2. Next, I will check each team's score to see if any team scored below 10 points.

3. After evaluating all the scores, I will determine if only essendon and footscray scored below 10 points or not.
   - If any other team has a score below 10 points, then the claim is FALSE. If every team except for essendon and footscray scores 10 points or more, then the claim is TRUE.

claim: no team that lose a game score less than 13 point during that game
resp:
1. Identify the total number of rows in the table to check each game's result.
2. For each row, compare the home team score with the away team score. If the home team score is less than 13 and greater than or equal to the away team score, then it means that team lost a game and scored less than 13 points during that game.
3. Check all rows one by one, and if no row meets the above condition, then the claim is true.
4. If any row has a home team score less than 13 and greater than or equal to the away team score, then the claim is false.
